name: Adventures of a snowboarder
description:
You are in the role of a novice snowboarder who accidentally moved off the wrong mountain) and now you have big problems with him. You need to go around all the obstacles to drive as far as possible and try to survive!
Beautiful Christmas trees, sharp saws, fallen trees and snow piles act as obstacles. You should be careful, the Christmas trees grow quite close to each other, and the saws move very quickly. Jump over snow piles and fallen trees with the help of trampolines. Collect coins, they will be useful for you to buy cool costumes for your hero!
